author: Richard Swan
description:
Last Updated on September 4, 2025 I went through a big Stephen King phase in my teens. The Stand was a life changing read for me, one of those books that just alters your brain chemistry. author: Ed Crocker
description:
Great writers take the theme of their book, and they don’t just say it, they show it with the rhythm of their writing: the flow of it, the feel of it, the pulse of it. What the hell do I mean, to the extent I ever mean anything? Well take the remarkable Coffin Moon by […]

title: REVIEW: Coffin Moon by Keith Rosson
